page.title: 05MADELEY STAFFS : TRADE
page.content: Trade in Madeley is geared towards the domestic market in both the retail & service areas.Families buy in bulk from large supermarkets in the towns;so demand limits local stock.But the community supports 2 butchers a general grocer & a greengrocer,who are supported by mobile shops.A fish & chip van also calls.Dry goods are represented by a shoe retailer,a draper a newsagent & an agricultural supplier. Building is the busiest service trade supporting 6 builders,2 decorators,2 plasteres,1 glazier,1 heating engineer & 1 electrician;with a white goods engineer & a T.V technician for domestic goods.Luxury services include 2 hairdressers and 1 licensed retail premises,4 public houses and a Working Men's Club,providing meals & rooms. Traditional village crafts are no longe practised in Madeley,alas.
